message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.NE. 

The paper discusses the design of reward functions in reinforcement learning, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of Systematic Instructional Design to engineer a machine education methodology also involves machine learning (cs.LG) and robotics (cs.RO). The application of the methodology to design a hierarchical genetic reinforcement learner involves system control (cs.SY) and neural networks (cs.NE).
